---
title: "Scraping_Practice"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
url <- "https://www.macalester.edu/registrar/academic-calendars/"
```

```{r}
page <- url |> read_html()
page
```

```{r}
content <- page |> 
  html_elements(".layout-interior__components") 
```

```{r}
content |> 
  html_elements("h3, h4") |> 
  html_text()
```


```{r}
content |> 
  html_element("table") |> 
  html_table()
```
